overview: Every year, Playboy receives hundreds of amateur home videos from girls across the country who hope to become Playboy Sexy Girls Next Door.  We review every tape and invite the hottest girls to L.A. for the full Playboy treatment. Before receiving the glamour treatment, these sexy sweethearts were your normal girls down the block. The only difference is that they decided to get naked in front of their own video cameras, just for us - and now you!  See our favorites just the way we first saw them... in their smoking hot, sexy amateur home videos!
title: Playboy: Sexiest Amateur Home Videos 2
